00060     PMeanPTemplate( double power, QualityMetric* qm = 0 ) 
00061       : ObjectiveFunctionTemplate(qm)

00065     }

00088     
00089         MESQUITE_EXPORT
00090     double get_power() const 
00091       { return mPower.value(); }
00092       
00093         MESQUITE_EXPORT
00094     void set_power( double p ) 
00095       { 
00096         mPower = p; 
00097         mPowerMinus1 = p - 1;
00098         mPowerMinus2 = p - 2;
00099       }
